pages.name: Shattered Table
pages.text: Use a Ritual Diviner for easier construction.

The Ritual of the Shattered table searches in an area above the Master Ritual Stone for any enchanted item and empty books.$(br2)Once found, it will attempt to transfer the enchants from the item onto the books.$(br2)Each enchantment transferred will increase the LP cost of the ritual by an amount equal to the Base Usage Cost times the number of enchantments removed.
